summary: This bill seeks to authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Ret. Col. Robert J. Graham for his acts of valor during the Vietnam War. It details Graham's heroic actions on May 1, 1966, during Operation Birmingham, where he flew combat missions despite severe damage to his aircraft. The bill describes his actions during the battle, including destroying enemy positions and saving many American lives. It also includes a waiver of time limitations to allow the award.
